question: I posted a few months ago, and I'm still confused, and now have even more symptoms.  About 2 years ago, everything started going wrong and has been going wrong ever since.  It started with being diagnosed with hypothyroidism, and I was menopausal.  Then I gained about 70 lbs. in 6 months!  (I'VE DONE THIS TWICE BEFORE IN MY LIFE, AND THEY NEVER KNEW WHAT CAUSED IT).  Then, I was diagnosed with rapid heart rate, and they don't know why, then I started getting skin tags and pimples all over my body.  Then, I was diagnosed with edema and "stiff" heart, high blood pressure, pre-diabetes, had to have gallbladder out, esophogeal stricture, esophogus closed and they had to go in and stretch it out, then I got paranthesis of my stomach and am on medication, I have SEVERE restless leg syndrome, so severe that I am taking three times the dosage of requip I used to take, I have it 24 hrs. a day.  Blurred vision, EXTREME EXHAUSTION, depression, brain fog, I ITCH EVERYWHERE and it's driving me crazy.It's like my entire body systems are ill, and I don't know what is wrong with me, and neither does anyone else.  I have been to about 5 endocrinologists, and all they EVER do is a cortisol test, thyroid tests, and diabetes tests.  I have been to 3 cardiologists, and one says I have a "stiff" heart, and another says I don't, I've had multiple heart tests, including echocardiogram, stress tests, MRI's, a bunch of them. At one point, they said I had hemochromatosis, but now they've changed their minds.  I have also been to my family doctor, and I don't know what else to do anymore, I am tired and sick and I ache.Can anyone put all this together and come up with some ideas of where to look?  Because I don't know anymore.  Thank you.
title: POSTED ONCE, BUT NOW MORE SYMPTOMS, HELP!
